name: Blu-Linx Technology
tag_list: mobile, broadband, communications, wi-fi, data-offload, telecommunications
overview:
Blu-Linx provides turn-key Mobile Data Offload + carrier (VAS) value-added services (SMS, MMS, etc.) mobile operator 3G/4G networks under intense strain from explosive growth in mobile data traffic due to proliferation of Smartphones employing data-hungry, media-rich APPs.

Utilizing proprietary software which empowers Wi-Fi spectrum with full 3G/4G network-compatibility, Blu-Linx Super Wi-Fi MetroZones provide seamless User-transparent “Bandwidth-on-Demand” to mobile resulting in significant cellular network capital expenses, while providing an alternative “overlay” wireless solution that is faster (Wi-Fi: 3x-7x faster than 4G), cost effective (fraction of 3G/4G build-out costs). Because Blu-Linx-enabled Wi-Fi is a fully 3G/4G-integrated network, Carriers remain connected to their subscribers, enabling provision Carrier-hosted VAS over Wi-Fi, along with subscriber tracking, billing + inter-network automatic “roaming”.

Blu-Linx deploys best of breed carrier-grade long range outdoor Wi-Fi antenna, configured in arrays over large-area MetroZones, providing ubiquitous coverage for major metro areas where mobile data traffic is heaviest, resulting in true on-the-go mobility for Users.
